title: Inquiry-Centered Language Education Design Based on Connected Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and understanding of academic inquiry methodologies
context.additional_context: Implementation of socially connected learning using digital media in the language domain.

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze at least three language materials connected to real-life contexts using digital tools
Learners can write one report investigating linguistic phenomena based on information acquired through social networks
Learners demonstrate collaborative skills by documenting their inquiry process in a digital portfolio and exchanging peer feedback at least twice

resources: Access to open-source databases for language learning

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
